comment: Why vaccinating young people is irresponsable. Numbers from the Netherlands GB and Israel combined show the risk of vaccination is higher than that of COVID for young adults and children
amr:
# ::snt Why vaccinating young people is irresponsable. Numbers from the Netherlands GB and Israel combined show the risk of vaccination is higher than that of COVID for young adults and children
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / responsible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (v / vaccinate-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :mod (y / young)))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / amr-unknown)))
      :snt2 (s / show-01
            :ARG0 (n / number
                  :source (a2 / and
                        :op1 (c2 / country
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Netherlands"))
                        :op2 (c3 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Israel"))
                        :ARG1-of (c4 / combine-01)))
            :ARG1 (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 (r2 / risk-01
                        :ARG2 (v2 / vaccinate-01
                              :ARG1 (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (a4 / adult
                                          :mod (y2 / young))
                                    :op2 (c5 / child
                                          :mod y2))))
                  :ARG2 (h2 / high-02
                        :ARG1 r2)
                  :ARG3 (m2 / more)
                  :ARG4 (r3 / risk-01
                        :ARG2 v2
                        :ARG3 (p2 / program
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "COVID")
                              :beneficiary a3)))))

comment: I really dont see why so grateful. The risk from Covid now so low (2 healthy people under have died of it in weeks) that more risk from the AZ vax.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / see-01

                  :ARG0-of (c / cause-01

                  :ARG3 s2)
            :ARG6 (d / die-01

            :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01
